* Iron Raptor snarled as she saw the Predacon's enter the Ark, she opened 
her com-link to Iris...*

" Iris, the Predacons are getting inside of the base, stop them!*
IRIS: "On it!"

* Iris scanned through the Arks programming and located the damaged shields, 
she refigured and repaired most of the components, soon a green shield began 
to glow on the outside of the Ark...a temporary shield running off of Iris's 
power supply. She then began to activate the Arks internal defences, 
auto-guns began to drop from the roof on the inside. Iris targeted the 
chest-plate of every Predacon that entered the ship and fired upon them, 
lasers lightened up the room as the auto-guns fired upon the intruders. 
However, she made careful aim to insure that no other transformer was 
damaged other then the Predacons.
Now, it was her defending the Ark!*
